name: World of Warcraft: Legion
description:
World of Warcraft: Legion is a RPG massively multiplayer game. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Blizzard Entertainment. World of Warcraft: Legion has a Metascore of 88, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play World of Warcraft: Legion on macOS and PC.
Alex Afrasiabi, Ion Hazzikostas and Tom "Evocare" Chilton directed the game. It was scored by Clint Bajakian, Neal Acree and Russell Brower.
